Player History
Injured on 7/9/1967 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 7/23/1967 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Released by Cleveland on 6/18/1972...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/1/1973 to a minor league contract.
Released by Texas on 5/19/1975...
Drafted in 5th round, 95th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1978...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Philadelphia on 6/23/1980 (Going to PIT: P J. Lamb. Going to PHI: C J. Quirk, 3B D. Baker)...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1984, off Willie Mueller (CHC)...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Injured on 4/11/1986 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
